name: SacriMage - A Ludum Dare 43 Game
description:
In SacriMage you are a Mage exploring a Dungeon. To be able to cast spells you will have to sacrifice some of them. How deep can you get ?

SacriMage is my second time entering a Ludum Dare and it still has a lot of rough edges. Nevertheless I hope your find some enyoment with it and as always any feedback is greatly appreciated.

If you need help on how to Play press the questionmark in the top right corner.
